Description.Text: Facilities The hotel features 100 accommodation units. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a bar, translation services and a business centre. Guests can use the parking spaces if required. Rooms The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Guests will also find a balcony in most rooms. The accommodation units each feature a queen-size bed. In addition, a fridge, a mini-fridge and tea and coffee making equipment are available. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B.
